entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Toronto Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto City Centre Airport 06:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 85 %
Dewpoint: -0.5°C
Wind: ENE 37 km/h gust 52 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this morning and ending this afternoon then 60 percent chance of drizzle late this afternoon. Freezing rain over northern sections this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:59 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:59 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:59 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:59 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
